title: Promoting Violence Against Media
summary: Trump shared video of him body-slamming CNN logo. Praised congressman who body-slammed Guardian reporter. Called press 'enemy of the people' - phrase used by Stalin, Hitler, Mao. Never condemned bomb threats against news organizations after his attacks.
keyFacts: Shared video of him body-slamming CNN logo
Praised Rep. Greg Gianforte who body-slammed Guardian reporter: 'Any guy that can do a body slam... he's my kind of guy'
Called press 'enemy of the people' - phrase used by Stalin, Hitler, Mao
Laughed when supporter suggested 'shooting' migrants at rally
Never condemned bomb threats against news organizations after his attacks
